personalInfo.name: Vansh Sutariya
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a strong background in building modern, scalable web applications. Lets collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

projects.title: I-NSTEIN
projects.description: Built I-nstein, a geospatial OSINT platform that ingests ACLED and fuses social-media PAI (X/Twitter, Telegram, VK) to track incidents in real time, render a 3D common intelligence picture with tactical graphics, and provide entity/case management with A-1 to F-6 reliability scoring.

projects.title: HelloCrowd
projects.description: Developed Hellocrowd, a cutting-edge event management platform enabling real-time event creation, dynamic ticketing, attendance tracking, and customizable mobile apps, enhancing event efficiency and user experience.

projects.title: DrZio
projects.description: Designed a health and fitness platform using WordPress, providing seamless navigation, engaging UI, personalized fitness tracking, and integrated payment options, ensuring accessibility and exceeding user expectations.

projects.title: Outdoor Advertisement
projects.description: Revolutionizing outdoor advertising with seamless poster management, insightful analytics, and user-friendly experiences for all roles.

projects.title: TourPath
projects.description: TourPath is a backend service that helps users discover the best tour packages between cities or states, offering detailed itineraries and routes. It simplifies travel planning by recommending optimal tours based on user preferences.

workExperience.company: Lanet Team and Solutions Pvt Ltd
keyResponsibilities: Led development of scalable backend microservices using Node.js and Firebase on Google Cloud, improving resource utilization by 20%.
Automated CI/CD pipelines with Docker and Jenkins, reducing release cycles by 30% and enabling zero-downtime deployments.
Developed interactive Tableau and Power BI dashboards, cutting fraud investigation time by 50%.
Built secure REST APIs and database integrations (MySQL, MongoDB), increasing transaction throughput by 25%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile sprints to deliver projects ahead of schedule.
Developed and optimized user-focused web interfaces using JavaScript and PHP, boosting user engagement by 25%.
Built and maintained custom WordPress modules with database integrations, reducing content management time by 15%.
Migrated legacy systems to modern frameworks (Next.js, NestJS) to enhance performance and maintainability.
Enhanced data reporting dashboards for faster business intelligence and decision-making.
Participated in Agile ceremonies and sprint reviews, improving team velocity by 10%.

education.institution: California State University, Long Beach, USA
education.description: Embarking on a journey to deepen expertise in computer science, with initial coursework focusing on advanced algorithms, artificial intelligence, and software engineering principles. Excited to explore innovative projects and cutting-edge research opportunities in AI and web technologies.

Graduated with a strong foundation in computer engineering, excelling in designing and deploying full-stack web applications. Developed hands-on expertise with Nextjs, Node.js, and SQL while delivering scalable and secure solutions. Accomplished significant projects, earning recognition for technical creativity and innovation.

testimonials.name: Ajeet Singh
testimonials.title: CEO
testimonials.feedback: Vansh is a fantastic developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His ability to solve complex problems is impressive.

testimonials.name: Krishnamohan Gupta
testimonials.title: CEO
testimonials.feedback: Vansh is a highly skilled developer who brings a lot of value to our projects. His expertise in full stack development is top-notch.
